a thing of dream and mist (2011)

for soprano saxophone and electroacoustic music

8.5 min

a thing of dream and mist was inspired by Conrad Aiken’s poem “Nocturne of Remembered Spring,” which deals with love, nostalgia, and the changing nature of memory. My intention was not to set this poem in a programmatic sense, but rather I sought to explore and respond to its rich atmosphere and vivid imagery.
